item.title: Continued daily dog mess, 17th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Relf Road, London

item.title: Old mattress - fly tipping, 17th August
item.description:
An old mattress has been fly tipped on Dunstans Grove. I found this outside my house (12) on return from holiday. It was a hazard and blocking the pavement so I have moved to space next to Quarry court. Please could someone come and collect this?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Dunstan's Grove, Nunhead, London

item.title: Dead fox on footpath, 17th August
item.description:
There is a deceased fox on the footpath outside of number 57 Merewood Road. It has clearly been hit by a car this morning and makes a particularly upsetting sight, as its insides are fully exposed and there is blood on the path and road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Merewood Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tress overhanging into road, 17th August
item.description:
The trees are overhanging into the road at the start they are having low down and scratching the top of cars and block your view when driving and then further down they the bushes need to be cut back as they scratch the side of your car as you drive past
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Woodchurch Close, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
